cab.content: This Document i3 the Property ofHis Britan-'- f.titary Secret.14402355Vow Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 20th December 1920.7403,iA^^SC2. 20th December. Owing to failure of Wana Waziris to comply with our terms, operations have been resumed, and Wana column advanced to Dargai storage on 16th. Slight sniping encountered, resulting in four men wounded. On same day column from Fort Sandeman advanced unopposed to Brunj, en route for reoccupation of former posts, Mir Ali Khel and Mughal Kot.
